title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: IoT Computing and Routing Algorithm Optimization Practical Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of computer networks and IoT concepts, with experience using simple smartphone applications
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of IoT optimization models based on Mobile Edge Computing (MEC) and Deep Learning (DL)
Learners can analyze performance differences between existing IoT routing algorithms and optimized algorithms by comparing experimental data
Learners can propose strategies to improve computing efficiency by over 20% through smartphone-based simulations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
